about.title: Who is Marcus?
about.headline: About me
about.description: Hi, I'm Marcus. I've been working in the IT world for about two years. I'm currently completing advanced training to become a front-end developer at the Developer Academy. I'm passionate about programming because I enjoy turning ideas into functional applications. The constant evolution of technology inspires me to improve my skills. I learn from every challenge while searching for the most efficient solution, continually discovering new, valuable insights. I'm ready to collaborate. Let's create something extraordinary together!
